text: The NBC Nightly News mistakenly reported Monday evening that Chicago Public Schools will move to remote classes this fall. On the contrary, CPS has not decided to cancel in-person classes and is still planning on a hybrid of in-person and remote learning. https://t.co/2zZjR5oQuF
